message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $115. I think you'll find it's a great deal!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $100?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle at $107?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $100. Would you be willing to go down to $105?
